thread.title: Aston Villa sack manager Tim Sherwood
thread.title_full: Aston Villa sack manager Tim Sherwood

author: Wires English | Indo-Asian News Service
title: Aston Villa sack manager Tim Sherwood
text:
Aston Villa sack manager Tim Sherwood By Indo-Asian News Service on October 26, 2015 at 1:14 AM Comments 
English Premier League club Aston Villa have sacked Tim Sherwood as manager after eight months in charge, the media reported. The club said in a statement on Sunday: “The board believes the results on the pitch were simply not good enough and that a change is imperative,” reported Xinhua. Villa suffered their six straight loss on Saturday (October 24) after a 2-1 defeat to Swansea, dropping to 19th in the standings. 
Sherwood, who was appointed in February, led the team to the FA Cup final and the 17th-placed finish in the last season. 
  26, 2015 1:19 AM Topics:
